comment: All homework on REVEL. You have 2 essay assignments- one you have to listen to sermons and write abt it and another you have to read a book he wrote. Very uplifting, and sweet Professor. It seemed like he genuinely cares for her students. You can Socratic the hw so its nbd its just the other two assignments. The book was controversial but good

The last book review assignment was terrible, he made us read a book that had very triggering topics and gave no alternate assignment. He then proceeded to make us write a good review on Amazon for his book for a grade.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Inspirational--Graded by few things

comment: Prof. Wesley is an amazing teacher. He really lets you have your own opinions. The class really is not that hard. He just wants you to enjoy learning about religion. There is not a lot of busywork. Also, the essays were not hard at all and he is not very harsh on grading. He gives great feedback! Just make sure to do your work!
